transArray.content: The location of the hotel is very convenient, just on the pedestrian street of Qianmen Street. Three minutes walk from Zhushikou Subway Station. It can go directly to Beijing West Railway Station. The staff of the hotel are very enthusiastic, and they are still helping to solve the problem of false pop-ups after get off work. The child likes this hotel very much, and said that he will stay here next time he comes to Beijing.
